comment: Super comfortable and stylish. I’ve been wearing them almost every day and they still look brand new. Definitely worth the price.
Great design and very comfortable for long walks. They did start to show some wear after about a year, but overall still a solid purchase.
Amazing experience overall. Friendly staff, quick service, and everything was exactly as expected. Would absolutely recommend.
The quality is top tier and they fit perfectly. I’ve gotten so many compliments on them already.
Really impressed with the comfort and durability. They feel premium and hold up well even with daily use.
Good overall experience. Clean environment, friendly service, and everything was handled smoothly.
It was decent but not amazing. The service was okay, and there’s definitely room for improvement in quality and consistency.
